lines: THE GREAT PHYSICIAN NOW IS NEAR
1. N’anga Yikulu Yikona, Wa Tsetselela Yesu;
Wa Hi Tshuxa Swidyohweni, Twana Rito Ra Yena.
Tintsumi Ta N’wi Vonga, Na Vanhu Va Dzunisa; Hi Tinsimu To Khensa, Yesu Wo Rhandzeka.
2. Hi Yimbelela Nyimpfana, Khokholo Ra Vutomi;
Ndzi Rhandza Vito Ra Yesu, Dzunisani Vito Rakwe.
3. Rito Rakwe Ra Matimba, Ri Susa Wo Mapfalo;
Ri Tisa Ku Rhula Moyen, Ku Rhula Ka Xikwembu.
4. Loko Yesu A Ta Vuya, U Ta Nyika Tiharhi;
A Nyika Tona Tinhenha, Vona Lava Hluleke.
